m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- May 1st, 2016 by Zachary Shahan   Remco van der Horst, COO of renewable energy crowdinvesting company Duurzaaminvesteren and founder of consultancy Greenproc, was one of the key people who organized meetings for me during my cleantech tour of the Netherlands last year.
